statements.select:
SELECT M.BIZ_ID , M.FIL_SEQ , M.TIT_NAM , M.GRP_TYP , M.CRE_USR, U.USER_NM ,case when length(M.CRE_YMD) = 8 then substr(M.CRE_YMD,1,4) || '-' || substr(M.CRE_YMD,5,2) || '-' || substr(M.CRE_YMD,7,2) else '' end as CRE_YMD , M.UPD_USR , M.UPD_YMD , M.CTNT FROM FMS_FILE_MAP M LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.SYS_USER_INFO U ON M.CRE_USR = U.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND M.BIZ_ID = #BIZ_ID#
AND M.GRP_TYP = #GRP_TYP#
ORDER BY M.FIL_SEQ
